knimeNode.name: Supply Chain Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads supply chain data from the database.

fullDescription.intro: This node reads supply chain data from the integrated database. It provides a table with Node/Station data, a table with Edge/Delivery data and a table containing the tracing data model. The data model is needed for all nodes that perform tracing ("Tracing View" and "Tracing").
fullDescription.option: If checked, the data is anonymized. That means addresses, names of companies and names of products are removed.

ports.outPort: Model that contains the relations between deliveries. Is provided by third out port of Supply Chain Reader.
